    U

    unregisterUser(String, UserRepository, MediaService) - Method in class backend.service.AdminService
    Unregisters a user after performing necessary checks: Admin must be logged in. User must exist. User must have no active borrowed books. User must have no unpaid fines.
    updateBook(Book) - Method in class backend.repository.BookRepository
    Updates an existing book in the CSV file.
    updateCD(CD) - Method in class backend.repository.CDRepository
    Updates a CD's information in the CSV file.
    updateFineBalance(String, double) - Method in class backend.repository.FineRepository
    Updates the fine balance of a specific user.
    updateOverdueFines() - Method in class backend.model.Librarian
    Updates overdue fines for all borrowed books and CDs.
    updatePassword(String, String) - Method in class backend.repository.AdminRepository
    Updates the password of an existing admin.
    updatePassword(String, String) - Method in class backend.repository.UserRepository
    Updates the password for a specific user.
